lockRotation.name: Lock Rotation
lockRotation.hint:
Toggles the selected tokens' Rotation Lock setting. A rotation-locked token won't rotate with movement or when using SHIFT + direction keys.
If you want every token to be rotation-locked by default, check the Lock Rotation setting in the About Face settings.

toggleTokenRotation.name: Toggle Token Rotation
toggleTokenRotation.hint: Tokens won't rotate during movement. Useful for games with Vision Angles.

tooltip.false: Token's Rotation on movement is unlocked.
tooltip.true: Token's Rotation on movement is locked.

sceneConfig.hint: Configure the About Face settings for this scene.

scene-enabled.name: Enable on this scene
scene-enabled.hint: Rotates tokens when moving them (except when locked). If disabled, can still hold SHIFT to rotate in place.

lockRotation.name: Lock Rotation
lockRotation.hint: Tokens created in this scene will have the Lock Rotation Token Configuration toggled on.

lockArrowRotation.name: Lock Indicator Rotation
lockArrowRotation.hint: The indicator won't change when a token moves. Use SHIFT + direction key to rotate the indicator.

options.changeEverySceneDialog: Would you like to change this setting on every scene?

arrowColor.name: Indicator Color
arrowColor.hint: Select a color for the indicator.

arrowDistance.name: Indicator Distance
arrowDistance.hint: Set the multiplier for the indicator's distance. Math: Largest Size Ã— (Multiplier / 2).

disableAnimations.name: Disable Animations
disableAnimations.hint: Disables the animations whenever the chosen movement is made.

hideIndicatorOnDead.name: Hide Indicator On Dead Tokens
hideIndicatorOnDead.hint: Hides the indicator from tokens marked as defeated on the combat tracker (e.g. the big skull marker on most systems).

indicatorDrawingType.name: Indicator Drawing Type
indicatorDrawingType.hint: Changes how the indicator is drawn.

lockArrowRotation.name: Lock Indicator Rotation
lockArrowRotation.hint: Every scene will be created with the About Face's Lock Indicator Rotation setting toggled on. The indicator won't change when a token moves in such a scene. Use SHIFT + direction key to rotate the indicator.

lockArrowToFace.name: Snap Indicator to Closest Tile
lockArrowToFace.hint: Snaps the indicator's direction to the closest tile it would be facing instead of the direction of the movement's angle. This setting is ignored if 'Lock Indicator Rotation' is on.

lockRotation.name: Lock Rotation
lockRotation.hint: Every scene will be created with the About Face's Lock Rotation setting toggled on. Tokens created in such a scene will have the Lock Rotation Token Configuration toggled on, which will make the token to not rotate when it moves.

lockVisionToRotation.name: Lock Vision to Rotation
lockVisionToRotation.hint: The token's vision will follow its rotation instead of its indicator. Useful for games with Vision Angles. SHIFT + direction key overrides this setting. This setting is ignored if "Mirror or Rotate Token" isn't set to "Rotate".

enable-indicator.name: NPC Token Indicators
enable-indicator.hint: Adds an indicator for direction to NPC tokens.

enable-indicator-pc.name: PC Token Indicators
enable-indicator-pc.hint: Adds an indicator for direction to player-controlled tokens.

flip-or-rotate.name: Mirror or Rotate Token
flip-or-rotate.hint: Instead of rotating a token, mirror it.

facing-direction.name: Facing Direction
facing-direction.hint: The default direction tokens are facing.
